name: 尤信程
objective: 本課程將深入探討一項或數項特定之數位信號處理技術。探討的主題:1. 濾波器之設計, 2. 多取樣率信號處理, 3. 分數時間延遲, 4. Sigma/delta A/D 轉換器, 5. 頻譜估測, 6. Adaptive filter 7. 其他實做之議題。
schedule:
1. Design of digital filters (FIR/IIR)
2. Multi-rate signal processing (with polyphase decomposition & filter banks)
3. Fractional time delay & interpolation
4. Sigma/delta A/D techniques
5. Linear prediction and spectral estimation
6. Adaptive filters
7. Other practical implementation issues (if time permitted)
